oai_dc:dc.dc:title: HRI, University of Warwick: Greenhouse
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greenhouses and coverings
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Approx 5000 m2 space in various sizes of compartment with heating, lighting, forced fan ventilation, shade screen, A/C and pollen filtration. Virus glasshouse Unit (10 A/C compartments) in self contained quarantine unit with own potting area and autoclave. Range of polytunnels, cold frames and sandbeds.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} HRI, University of Warwick: Greenhouse. Facility Leader(s): Mann, Sally, University of Warwick.
